mapper.select: select r.*, p.payment_status_cd "paymentStatusCd", p.payment_method_cd "paymentMethodCd" from reservation r, payment p where r.payment_id = p.payment_id

select r.*, p.payment_status_cd "paymentStatusCd", p.payment_method_cd "paymentMethodCd" from reservation r, payment p where r.payment_id = p.payment_id and TO_CHAR(r.START_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{starStr}
select * from game where game_id = (select r.game_id from reservation r where r.res_id = #{resId})
select * from member_game where game_id = (select r.game_id from reservation r where r.res_id = #{resId}) and ground_cd = 1 order by ground_cd asc, bat_order asc
select * from member_game where game_id = (select r.game_id from reservation r where r.res_id = #{resId}) and ground_cd = 2 order by ground_cd asc, bat_order asc
select * from reservation r, payment p where r.payment_id = p.payment_id and r.res_id = #{resId}
